p:
Furthermore, the ACE2 receptor, which is present in the nervous system and the skeletal system,
13 was identified as the functional receptor for SARS-CoV-2.
14 There is also some speculation that invasion into the CNS and damage to the medullary cardiorespiratory centers may lead to worsening respiratory symptoms.
15 Also, with the prior SARS epidemic, multiple human brain specimens demonstrated direct infection of neuronal cells within the cerebral cortex and hypothalamus.
16
